method.name: Load
method.comment: Loads the GIF from the pathname specified and decodes the individual frames.

method.name: FrameImage
method.comment: Returns the Image of the specified frame.

method.name: FrameDelay
method.comment: Returns the delay time, in milliseconds, for the frame number specified. This time is the period for which the frame should be displayed before advancing to the next frame.

method.name: SaveFrame
method.comment: Saves a frame to the file and path specified. Note: that a file extension is not automatically added and must be specified as part of the filename. The file formats are JPG, JPEG and PNG based on the file extension given.

method.name: DisposeAllFrames
method.comment: Disposes of all the frame bitmaps of any presently loaded GIF file. This may be necessary for memory management purposes on a device.

property.name: LoopCount
property.comment: Returns the iteration count, if one was specified, in the last GIF loaded otherwise it returns 1. The iteration count specifies how many times the animation should be displayed. A count of 0 means repeat indefinitely.

property.name: Height
property.comment: Returns the Height of the last GIF loaded.

property.name: Width
property.comment: Returns the Width of the last GIF loaded.

property.name: NumberOfFrames
property.comment: Returns the number of frames in the last GIF loaded.
